import{validateForm}from'@utils/validateUtils';import{validateQrCode,validateSelectExecutiveCode}from'@utils/validator';import axios from'axios';import{useMutation,useQuery}from'react-query';// export type QrCodeRequest = { qrreceived: string };
export const QrCodeFields=(fieldName,formData)=>{switch(fieldName){case'number':return validateQrCode(formData[fieldName]);default:return'';}};export const validateQrCodeForm=formData=>validateForm(formData,QrCodeFields);export const HandoverQrFields=(fieldName,formData)=>{switch(fieldName){case'sub_admin_id':return validateSelectExecutiveCode(formData[fieldName]);default:return'';}};export const validateHandoverQrForm=formData=>validateForm(formData,HandoverQrFields);export const useGetQrCodeHistoryApi=request=>{return useQuery(['get_qr_history',request],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_qr_history/",params:request}));};export const useGetQrCodeCountApi=()=>{return useQuery(['QR_dashboard_count'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/QR_dashboard_count/"}));};export const useGeneraeteQRApi=()=>useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/generate_qr/",data:info.request}));export const useUpdateQRBgApi=()=>useMutation(info=>{const formData=new FormData();if(info.request.bg_url_1&&typeof info.request.bg_url_1!=='string')formData.append('bg_url_1',info.request.bg_url_1[0],info.request.bg_url_1[0].name);if(info.request.bg_url_2&&typeof info.request.bg_url_2!=='string')formData.append('bg_url_2',info.request.bg_url_2[0],info.request.bg_url_2[0].name);if(info.request.bg_url_3&&typeof info.request.bg_url_3!=='string')formData.append('bg_url_3',info.request.bg_url_3[0],info.request.bg_url_3[0].name);return axios({method:'POST',url:"/add_update_bg_img/",data:formData});});export const useGetQRBgUrlsApi=()=>{return useQuery(['get_qr_bg'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_qr_bg/"}));};export const useDownloadQRApi=()=>useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/download_qr/",data:info.request}));export const useHandoverQrApi=()=>useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/handover_qr/",data:info.request}));export const useGetSelectExecutiveListApi=()=>{return useQuery(['get_subadmin_name'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_subadmin_name/"}));};export const useReceiveQRApi=()=>useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/receive_qr/",data:info.request}));
